name: Bump and Jump
description:
I started and made this with my team "Groop" as a group project of school. So the player "Kid" must reach to the school bus in order to get back to the school! However be careful. There are lots of enemies and hazards that can kill you!

WASD to move and space to jump. Stomp on enemies can kill them. Click Powers to use that power.

Powers: Sprint, Invincibility.
